data.title: Les Gaz mortels
data.meta_description: Les Gaz mortels is a 1916 silent French film directed by Abel Gance.
data.text:
1916 French film / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Les Gaz mortels is a 1916 silent French film directed by Abel Gance.[1]
